Item.Line: (Upon arriving Warsaw, you spot a familiar figure immediately.)
Frederic!
Hello my friend, I assume everything is well?
Yes, I got the recommendation letters required to enter the competition!
Great. I also found out something about your rival.
It turns out his parents are also famous musicians, but they were completely overshadowed by your parents.
Out of jealousy, his parents might had hired assassins to get rid of your parents.
I am very sorry, but I am afraid this is what happened. His parents commited suicide shortly afterwards, maybe out of guilt and regret.
The reason the green hair boy provokes you, I believe, is because he feels guilty of his parents' evil deed.
Although he is very talented, he does not want to compete in the same competition as you.
He mocked you in Montmartre because he wanted to motivate you to improve.
I don't even know his name yet!
Worry not. If you win the competition this year, he will return as a strong challenger next year, that is for sure.
Alright, let's go to Vienna!
Wait. Before that, I want to personally seen how much you have grown.
Here, why don't you perform this piece that I have just finished writing.
You are my friend, Frederic, but why are you suddenly judging me?
Because I was one of the six grand masters. Lang Lang replaced me after I quitted, because I wanted to focus on composing music.
You were a grand master...?
My full name is Frederic Chopin. People call me the poet of the piano.
